name: 奈米磁性物理及其應用（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【OEC8116  奈米磁性物理及其應用（一）】 ◎課程不開放上修
goals: 1. To make students understand the special magnetic properties in the nanoscale.
2. To Let students know about the application of nanomagnetism in memory devices.
3. To make students familiarize with the key technologies of magnetic biomedical detection.
4. To make students  understand the integrated applications between nanomagnetism and other materials.
syllabus:
【Teaching method: 16+2 weeks】

Week 1~3 Magnetic Nano Principles & Basic Skills IV for Engineering Application (Programming, Electronic Control)

Weeks 4-7: Application of Basic Skills in Engineering Application-Students' Topics

Week 8 Interim Report

Week 9~11 Basic Skills V of Magnetic Nano Application & Engineering Application (Science, Simulation)

Week 12~15 Application of Basic Skills in Engineering Application-Student Topics

Week 16 Final Report

Week 17 Digi course(Self-learning)

Week 18 Digi course(Self-learning)

methodologies.note: To describe the important concepts and theories of nanomagnetic physics and their related applications.To take the basic science as the starting point to cultivate the basic ability of engineering application.
The classroom discussion to increase student interaction and communication, and to increase students’ s learning benefits.
The discussion and report on various topics in student groups. Meanwhile, the research and discussion of materials is conducted.

grading.note: Evaluation by the participation of class discussion.
Evaluation by students’ s attending classes.
Evaluation by the content and expression of the final report.

prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【OEC8116  Physics and Applications of Nano-Magnetism (I)】 ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
